# Example Email Data Text

This would be a template email message in `config/emails/<emailName>/data/<fileName>.ext`.

()=>```text
Hello CH-EMAILONLIST,

Attached is your bill statement and/or update for the week.
Below is a summary:

summary
Please mail your payment to:

Company Name
P.O. Box 123
Another Town, ST 45678

Thanks, and have a great week!

Take Care,

Email: name@example.com
Website: https://www.example.com

Office Phone: (555) 555-1234
Mobile Phone: (555) 555-1236
Fax Number: (555) 555-1235

Mailing Address
P.O. Box 123
Another Town, ST 45678

Station Location
1010 ST-0
Out of Town, ST 12345
```
